name: SCNSceneRendererDelegate
desc: Methods your app can implement to participate in SceneKitâ€™s animation loop or perform additional rendering.

items.name: func renderer(SCNSceneRenderer, updateAtTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to perform any updates that need to occur before actions, animations, and physics are evaluated.

items.name: func renderer(SCNSceneRenderer, didApplyAnimationsAtTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to perform any updates that need to occur after actions and animations are evaluated.

items.name: func renderer(SCNSceneRenderer, didSimulatePhysicsAtTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to perform any updates that need to occur after physics simulations are performed.

items.name: func renderer(SCNSceneRenderer, willRenderScene: SCNScene, atTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the renderer has cleared the viewport and is about to render the scene.

items.name: func renderer(SCNSceneRenderer, didRenderScene: SCNScene, atTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the renderer has rendered the scene.
